website_summaries.verdict: Good audio quality throughout the range, even though the kit is smaller than average.
pros: Includes both high-frequency drivers and mid-range drivers for a strong quality of audio
Works with most Bluetooth enabled mobile devices
Plenty of connection ports to allow you to hook up the soundbar however you want
cons: Price is above average for a soundbar
Not as focused on dialogue sound

customer_reviews.title: Now it’s working!
customer_reviews.text: Originally had some issues with getting sound though the hdmi arc connection but could get it through the optical connection. Contacted seller and they made a commitment about the soundbar being pcm and Dolby digital compatible and sent me the specific instructions from the tv manufacturer insignia. In the end when I turned off the auto sound output from my tv menu and selected just basic Dolby digital only that is what got the soundbar to work. Happy customer with klipsch and seller world wide stereo.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hermsen

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great but no volume reference (1-100%)
customer_reviews.text: Could not get the HDMI ARC to work, had to use the optical input. Sounds great but no volume reference (1-100%)
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 11 months. Klipsch customer service didn't help.
customer_reviews.text: Speaker sounded fine until the 11 month mark. Started making weird sounds and high pitched squeals. I contacted Klipsch and went around and around with them for about a month. They took two weeks to respond to my initial "case" and only offered basic solutions like unplugging and resetting the device. Nothing worked and when it finally came time to get the unit repaired I was told they could not help me because I bought it through a 3rd party retailer on Amazon. Their product failed and they should stand behind it. How could I possible know that the manufacturer wouldn't cover the product if it was defective? I've been a Klipsch customer for over 20 years but no longer.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Fravel II

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and make sure to place the sub correctly
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and loads of volume. I bought this for the sub and I'm a little disappointed. Even at Max sub volume I'm not getting the thumping bass that I expect from Klipsch. Update: I noticed the Klipsch lable on what I thought was the side of the sub. I turned it 90 degrees and I'm getting more bass now.
customer_reviews.author: Brad C.

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. Easy set up. Klipsch sound. Lack of volume level annoying. Expensive compared to others but beats the outrageously over-priced and over-hyped Sonos.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crisp, well rounded sound.  Helps w/ vocals and bass is amazing
customer_reviews.text: Very clear sound! I can understand what people are saying on screen much better when the sound comes through the sound bar. It improves sound reproduction and fidelity in general, and the bass is absolutely excellent! Klipsch has an awesome tweeter design, which is what makes the vocals so clear. I think they make the best tweeters in any sound bar of this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Be careful to get everything working.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Klipsch rsb-11 soundbar to replace my rb-4. The first soundbar came and the subwoofer had no power. The light wouldn't go on so no power and no ability to pair with the soundbar. Klipsch sent another power cord to see if it fixed the problem. It didn't. So I asked for and received another rsb-11 soundbar. The second one was as defective as the first. Only now a high pitched whining sound came from the far left speaker. So Amazon has no more rsb-11 soundbars available. I have ordered one directly from Klipsch but have to pay for two-day shipping. We'll see if the third time is a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Borges

customer_reviews.title: Continuous hissing sound
customer_reviews.text: Built quality is great. But the bar has continuous hissing sound, very annoying, and it doesn't disappear when the volume is on. I tried different presets, same story. Bluetooth sound is also not great, constantly crackling. Subwoofer seems to be good. Strong bass and lows
customer_reviews.author: Geo

customer_reviews.title: Sound is great, Bluetooth sucks
customer_reviews.text: Sound is great, Bluetooth sucks!!! I saw other reviewers mention the Bluetooth issue, I have to try multiple times to get it to connect and the phone has to be within 5 feet. I have earbuds that work fine at any distance in the house from my phone! Whatever, it is stellar in every other aspect.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Hiscocks

customer_reviews.title: Klipsch RSB-11 sounds amazing!
customer_reviews.text: After surrendering my Yamaha HTR 5.1 speakers to the cause of a non wired living room, I can surely say this is a fantastic replacement! For a large and open living room the RSB 11 floods the house with sound goodness. I tried every soundbar available in any retail store I visited and I can surely say the power and quality of the sound this soundbar produces is outstanding. Bluetooth has a short range but the reproduction of music is solid and robust.
customer_reviews.author: Zoey

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, poor build quality, poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality was quite good, but the system always had minor glitches and quirks. Eventually this bar died about 6 months after purchase. Placing a ticket with customer service was painless enough, but no response was received for several weeks. I eventually called and was able to get warranty to approve an RMA, but I had to find a way to box the thing up and pay shipping to send it back so they could check it out. I understand this is policy, but I found it to be archaic and too much of a hassle. Whether unreasonable or not, I decided to just cut the loss and invest in Sonos.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan kilgore

customer_reviews.title: Good sound bar without blowing a budget
customer_reviews.text: I like how easy it was to set up and get running. I was not able to get it to operate the volume with the tv however. It’s ok as I have a universal remote that solves that anyway. That also allows me to use the optical cable instead of piping the sound through an hdmi cable. Pros: -easy to install and get running. -decent sound with good bass (controllable) -looks nice. Cons: -volume control through the hdmi ARC cable didn’t work. -unable to adust/equalize the sound.
customer_reviews.author: Brian W. King

customer_reviews.title: Klipsch Quality on a Budget
customer_reviews.text: Klipsch speakers are in the largest theatre chain (Harkins) in metro Phoenix. So if you're looking to INCREMENTALLY improve your TV audio experience, but don't want to spend thousands of dollars, this system is unbeatable. I got it for Game of Thrones' final season and the wireless bluetooth subwoofer shook the couch (behind us) with Drogon's dragon roars and the Battles of Winterfell and King's Landing. The middle channel is crisp for clear dialogue and the setup and interface are a breeze. It's the best $400 I've ever spent on audio equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I've always been loyal to Klipsch but I might have to find a new brand. Never could get the ARC control to work with my TCL Roku tv, but that wasn't the end of the world. Now I get a PS4 Pro and waste a half hour trying to figure out why I have no video, turns out it's not passing through the RSB-11. I'll contact Klipsch support and see if they can help but I'm not happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: nfldriver

customer_reviews.title: Bass lacking compared to other sound bars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound but system needs more bass. The highs are nice and sound quality is fine. A bit disappointing because I love Klipsch products. I’ll go back to a separate sub system and satellites.
customer_reviews.author: thomas j schuerman

customer_reviews.title: Klips, I love you!
customer_reviews.text: I have their computer speakers is, why I began looking. I was going to get the RSB - 8 and then saw that the RSB -11 was about the same price on here as the other was at Fry's so I got it. I am no audiophile, but now I get it. This is probably not going to meet a true audiophile's pallet, but these are good enough to where you can really hear some quality sound. I have done movies, music (classical, techno/trance, pop) all sound amazing. So if you're not quite the audiophile and looking for amazing quality on a budget I would say pull the trigger on these.
customer_reviews.author: Judgement

customer_reviews.title: HDMI Switching Built-In
customer_reviews.text: Great Sound Bar!! I was really surprised by how good this sounds. I bought it for the built-in HDMI switching feature which worked wonderfully, but the sound quality really made this great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Great budget soundbar
customer_reviews.text: Great budget soundbar. Purchased for $299. The bass shakes the whole room if you want it too. Has a lot of settings that should help with whatever your listening to.I also have a Klipsch 2.1 computer speaker set that I've been using for 5+ years that sounds amazing. I 'm glad I purchased another Klipsch product.
customer_reviews.author: NowhereMan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing if it stays working.
customer_reviews.text: Only had it for about 8 months and the subwoofer already went out. Without the subwoofer that sound bar ain't any better than some cheap one. Would leave 5 starts because it was amazing when the subwoofer worked but not it's nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Flores

customer_reviews.title: Paid too much for what I got.
customer_reviews.text: My Vizio sound bar burned out so I noticed Klipsch made a sound bar. I was very disappointed with what I got for the money I paid. The sound is excellent but the subwoofer is basically useless unless you really crank it up. The whole system sounds excellent but only when turn it way up. I miss my old Vizio sound bar for half the price!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce P Starks

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal sound.  Marginal firmware.
customer_reviews.text: Sound is EXCELLENT. Power up is slow and starts a low volume. I always have to turn it on, wait, then turn it up. If it weren't for this, it would be a 5-star product.
customer_reviews.author: B. Ellsworth

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great
customer_reviews.text: For a sound bar the sound quality is great. I picked one up for 200 because the box had damage but nothing wrong with the system. I love the features on it, the only con I have is you don't get a volume display so not really sure where your sub level is at but I consider this to be a very small problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Good sound.
customer_reviews.text: It was scratched up more than expected. Sounds good though.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound bar!! Dialogue comes through crisp and clear!! I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Works great with 4K Sony TV, AppleTV, Blu-Ray DVD
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, great interface. Works seamlessly with 4K Sony TV with HDMI ARC, AppleTV, Blu-Ray DVD. Selects input source correctly, allows volume control on the device's remote. Still need the Klipsch remote to set Dialog and Surround modes and subwoofer level adjustment. It replaced a Sony soundbar system. Ironically, that product would not work properly with the Sony TV. It would have ample volume when streaming from an iPhone through a BT connection, so no problem with amplifier power, but could not handle the decoding of digital audio with the same HDMI ARC connection that Klipsch has no problem with. At the highest volume you could barely hear the sound, the TV's built in speakers would be louder.
customer_reviews.author: Picky

customer_reviews.title: Quality Sound
customer_reviews.text: Very clean dynamic sound, easy to install and wireless subwoofer has great range. Only down side is the Bluetooth connection, you lose connection pretty fast.
customer_reviews.author: E. Tambo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product. Easy to use and hook up. The quality of sound is a lot better than some other sound bars I’ve heard and the base is just enough but not overpowering. Would recommend to any one!
customer_reviews.author: aaron longgood

customer_reviews.title: Speaker and subwoofer
customer_reviews.text: Sounds is working great! Recommend getting the optical cord for best sound. Was in terrific shape for being used. Very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie L Olson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and looks great under Sony 65". Little pricy but sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: 1badtie

customer_reviews.title: does not do what i expected for tv
customer_reviews.text: music dvds sound an 8 on one to ten performance is over hyped
customer_reviews.author: paul tremblay

customer_reviews.title: Great Sounding!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the style and sound that this sound bar delivers. Crisp vocal and nice punch to the bass.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Arc works well with Samsung tv
customer_reviews.text: I waited for the price to go down before I purchased. It's a step up from the flat screen speakers. The sub has decent bass. I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good. Almost great!
customer_reviews.text: The sound out of this thing is pretty darn good. Bass is awesome. I kind of wish there was a little more fine tuning available (would love to boost the treble a bit more). Also.. Bluetooth is somewhat temperamental, as is the "auto-on" feature. I'd probably say that about 40-45% of the time, after turning the TV on, I have to turn the soundbar off, and back on to get any audio out of it. Aside from that, fills my large living room with pretty good sound.
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: Great vendor
customer_reviews.text: Great item! dealing w xoomtex was great. I had a great experience!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Platin

customer_reviews.title: Packs plenty of punch!!
customer_reviews.text: Actually 4 1/2 stars. Excellent sound bar and sub woofer. Packs plenty of punch! My only complaint is a minor one. The digital face on the sound bar is tiny and very hard to see from a distance. Sometimes it's hard to tell if I have things set to blue tooth unless I walk right up to the unit and squint. It's that difficult. Well worth the money for the great sound, though!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Lind

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: The best sound I ever heard. It's so good I bought one for camper too.
customer_reviews.author: Deramax

customer_reviews.title: Way better than Polk Audio. Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Originally I bought a Polk Audio soundbar and my daughters quickly blew the sub. Ordered this one and am very pleased. The sound is fantastic. I really don't know why there are some negative reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Andy from FL

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and bass
customer_reviews.text: The sound is amazing! The bass sounds amazing. The room definitely rumbles with the right program.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan X

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: Sounds amazing! Only issue we’ve had is getting the Bluetooth to connect to our phones. Klipsch website/user guide that came with the sound bar hasn’t been helpful in figuring out the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Scheler

customer_reviews.title: This thung fills my large room with great sound so glad i didnt spend the extra money ...
customer_reviews.text: This thung fills my large room with great sound so glad i didnt spend the extra money for a bose
customer_reviews.author: Gary Surprise

customer_reviews.title: Its really worth the price. Been using it for ...
customer_reviews.text: Its really worth the price. Been using it for a year and bought a second one. However don't expect the crystal clear what you find in expensive(1500+) bars.
customer_reviews.author: Papitha logabiraman

customer_reviews.title: Best soundbar for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my klipsch. Sound quality is very good for the price. The subwoofer produces beautiful lows.
customer_reviews.author: Elmer R. P.

customer_reviews.title: but Amazon replaced with no hassle and we love it.
customer_reviews.text: The original one that showed up was defective, but Amazon replaced with no hassle and we love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The sound is great but the bluetooth sucks bad
customer_reviews.text: The sound is great but the bluetooth sucks bad! I have to have my phone right next to the unit. Very Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad Sub-Woofer new out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Well based on all the 5-star reviews I purchased this Sound Bar. Very disappointing. Straight out of the box the Sub-woofer didn't work. It only made a static-scratchy sound with an occasional pop. While trouble shooting the problem I just listened to the sound bar. Very underwhelming, my TV speakers sounded better. I tried different programs, dolby, non-dolby, TV programing, DVD, all very poor sound. I had never tried Klipsch before but had always heard good things. I'll never try them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this system
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this system! The sound is so much better than lower priced sound bars. We would buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Pinchdpeny

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a deep thud subwoofer and I got it, wow!!! Very happy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound! When I got it it required some ...
customer_reviews.text: Great sound! When I got it it required some updates which were a little tricky to figure out. Great value and sound. It's a little too big for my room that I have (which is extremely small) but it's awesome
customer_reviews.author: William Schultze

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound, very easy to use and setup. Also works as a component switcher. Amazing value!
customer_reviews.author: thomas maggi jr

customer_reviews.title: Everything looked good out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on schedule. Everything looked good out of the box. Set up, though not like an APPLE product, was manageable, till subwoofer part. It connected to the bar, but the sound was terrible- crackles, noises, that’s all I got after 3 attempts! The subwoofer was BROKEN! Called Amazon- they have no problems taking the whole system back, but all I really wanted is the working system- maybe sending me a new subwoofer should have been an option???
customer_reviews.author: alexander d.

customer_reviews.title: not what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I'm looking for best sound for watching regular television - specifically normal dialog and sound - (I have 7.1 for movies). This soundbar was very disappointing -. I've tried some Sony, Sonos, yamaha - best so far are the Samsungs.
customer_reviews.author: computerguy

customer_reviews.title: complete garbage!
customer_reviews.text: Do not order ! Product arrived without a power cord ! complete garbage !
customer_reviews.author: D. Nine

product_meta.title: Klipsch Reference RSB-11 Sound Bar with Wireless Subwoofer
product_meta.description: Klipsch Reference RSB-11 Sound Bar with Wireless Subwoofer
feature_bullets: Featuring Klipsch tractrix horns for detailed, impactful sound
Integrated Dolby Audio for an incredible listening experience

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars121 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
